body_html: tf.nn.sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits is the equivalent function here -- the "sparse_" means that the distribution is hard, i.e. (0, 1, 0, ..., 0) not (0.5, 0.25, 0.25, 0, ... 0), which is what SpatialClassNLLCriterion is also assumes
